Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Enable/disable tweaked Unleashed physics. If disabled, the game will revert to either vanilla physics or the physics of another mod.

Tweaked SU physics offers a balance of the best of SA and Unleashed physics. Built for platforming, speeding and fun. This also makes slope physics more apparent. Try these physics before settling on your preference!

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Redux Camera Style adds more to the sense of speed and provides a satisfyingly smooth camera. Similar to the Unleashed camera, but different. Use this if you're playing with the tweaked physics!
NOTE: Enabling the Unleashed Style Camera code in HMM WILL override the Redux camera. Disable the code if you wish to use the Redux camera!
Uses the English Voice (Jason Griffith) for Sonic.
Uses the Japanese Voice (Jun'ichi Kanemaru) for Sonic.
More than a friendship bracelet...
It's... Sonic! Just, Sonic.
A personal taste of Dex's. Red soles just hit differently.
A timeless colour pallete for the grey sole enjoyers!
Enable Tweaked Unleashed Physics. A balance of the best of SA and Unleashed physics. Built for platforming, speeding and fun!
Features:
- Faster air physics
- Tweaked slope physics
- Faster and smoother character rotation (ground and air)
- Increased speeds
- Air boost has more of an impact
- Based off Unleashed's physics
- Many more changes made to carefully craft the ultimate Sonic experience
Disable Tweaked Unleashed Physics. Game reverts back to vanilla Gens physics or another physics file if a mod enabled includes new physics.
Enable Redux Camera Style. This adds more to the sense of speed. Similar to the Unleashed camera but different. Use this if you're playing with the tweaked physics!
Features:
- New camera offset values
- Smoother camera movement
- Super satisfying to play with
- Unleashed FOV when boosting with new distance offsets
- Lazily follows Sonic when quickstepping, like Unleashed
- Improved 2D camera for better visibility
- Many more changes to improve the existing camera
Disable Redux Camera Style. Game reverts back to the vanilla camera or a different camera if a mod has camera files included.
